newsitem.title: CHINA: Shanghai foreign firms profits up 20 pct in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Shanghai foreign firms profits up 20 pct in 1996.

text.p: The combined profits of the 9,157 foreign-funded firms in Shanghai rose 20 percent last year to 12.2 billion yuan ($1.47 billion), the Shanghai Star newspaper reported on Tuesday.

The newspaper said the combined turnover of the firms rose to 207.2 billion yuan ($25 billion), up 48.5 percent from 1995 with foreign firms involved in the service sector experiencing the fastest growth.
